Articles.Content:
Hi! It's me again, the dragon guy. This time I'm going to tell you the tragic tale of the bumblebee who wanted to go to the Mun but couldn't, because his friends wouldn't let him. Not until he made a new, magic mosquito friend, that is.

This was originally meant as a sequel to my dragon video, where a young, adventurous dragon encounters a special bumblebee who wants to show him the way to the Mun. However, I then felt that it would be better off without one, so I decided to just make it an independent video instead, with the special bumblebee as the main character.

I made this just for fun. I like writing nonsensical stories sometimes.
That's really good I love the design it's really unique
Thanks! I hope it was... ehm, informative.
